title: [Placements] Need info regarding Bain Capability Network .
content: My friend has been offered an internship only role at BCN (fte based on performance) , does any senior know the intern to fte conversion percentage or any info about the company in general?

comments.body: It's not good role for CSE Graduates ! You will not get any SDE / ML job anywhere outside with such experience.

Any idea how many got 77 were shortlisted for interview. 
Also could you dm the list who all got could be easy to fill excel
It's a good company; Last year around 8 people where offered internship+pbc and as per my knowledge 5 people got ppo and 1 didn't get( I don't have info about other 2 people)
